review: Not really sold in it yet. Have had it a couple months.
author: Robert Rock

review: I have really enjoyed the Fire TV Stick.  It was a nice surprise and exceeded my expectations.  It took 5 minutes to set up and have enjoyed it as much as my Apple TV.  It's a great buy for the money.
author: Eunice Patton

review: PURCHASED AS PART OF ORIGINAL BETA.  NFG!
author: Amazon Customer "Art & Lynn"

review: Great product streams everything I need.
author: Joy Callaway

review: Love it. Literally just plug it in and it works. If you are a Prime Member there is no reason not to have this. Prime Videos, Netflix, You Tube all right through your WiFi. Plugs right into the HDMI port on your TV and it comes with your Prime already loaded. Started using it the minute we turned it on.
author: Kabby

review: Small and Useful. Not as good as the Fire TV or Apple TV - but cool for a wall mounted TV or trying to keep a low profile....
author: SnagglePuss
